Class SquareWave

java.lang.Object
  ddf.minim.signals.Oscillator

All Implemented Interfaces:
AudioSignal
public class SquareWave
extends Oscillator

A square wave alternates between 1 and -1 at regular intervals.

Author:
ddf
See Also:
Square Wave
